title: Not Just Jumping

panel_structure.description: Massive digital/organic tree with rabbit hole at its base, circuit bark covered in moss, code transforming into ayahuasca vines, Evan's silhouette diving impossibly deep past the surface layers

transformation_notes: The rabbit hole becomes a profound metaphorâ€”showing how Evan didn't just peek in but dove past all the safe questions into the terrifying beautiful unknown of 'what am I?'
